title: "Be Cast"
description: Case for picnic cutlery 1999-53-21/25.  Black rectangular shape with curved corners; the hinged lid, with raised lozenge-shaped section at left and "BE CAST US" logo on upper right, opens to reveal cutlery fitted in sectioned base; each section labled with the name of the corresponding piece: from left to right: spoon, fork, knife, pick, pick.
name: Case
